metaface.server
Class VHMLParser

java.lang.Object
  metaface.server.VHMLParser
public class VHMLParser
extends Object

This class is used to construct an eXtensible Markup Language (XML) parser for a Virtual Human Markup Language (VHML)document.

Follow this link to retrieve the Document Type Definition vhml.dtd Follow this link to retrieve an example XML file vhml_example.xml

Version:
1.0
Author:
Simon Beard

Constructor for the VHMLParser object

Parameters:
response_file - The VHML file to parse
framespersec - The frame rate for animation
digitalsignalprocessor - The DSP
naturallanguageprocessor - The NLP
smldtdpath - The path to the SML DTD (for SPEMO parsing)
